name: Quick Sandwich
rankingString: #26 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text:
Tijdens mijn zakentrip besloten we om eens lekker shoarma te gaan eten.

Bestelling duurde een eeuwigheid terwijl er niemand was.

Toen we de shoarma sandwich kregen heb ik er een hap van genomen en meteen weer uitgespuugd.
Taai vlees en vieze saus.

Niet aan te raden en ook niet om te proberen.
reviews.title: Ranzig

location.address: Marhaba Touristic Village Wall, Atef El Sadat St. In Front Of Governorate Bldg., Port Said Egypt

name: El Gendy For SeaFood
rankingString: #25 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text: We have been there at style square El Gendy Restuarant for more than once. You do not get what you order as described in the menu. Grilled chicken is grilled chicken bones. Perhaps they chop the meat for another recipe e.g.sheesh Tatook. They do not have boneless grilled chicken but surely they have meatless chicken. Great , well masked cheating.
reviews.title: Not Satisfying and Be Ware

reviews.text: I don't know from where to begin. I went there with my husband the waiter gave us the menu and every 5 minutes he would stand beside us to rush us to order while we were still discussing what to eat ! Second thing we ordered "tagn koftet gambary" and we ended up having ordinary "tagn gambary" which was awful and shrimp was so small. The only thing that was good is the grilled fish. Overall it is overpriced not worth the money at all.
reviews.title: Worst experience ever !

reviews.text: Me and my family going every month to visit portsaid and eat seafood there and this time we order delivery from this restaurant, the order taker is professional and so friendly,the delivery guy is very polite and decent,back to the food is not worth the amount of money as quality or quantity, we can say the taste was ok not excellent no variety of salads or enough breads,all in all it was not good .
reviews.title: No quality No quantity

reviews.text: We were 5 people for dinner. Some of us had reasonable quality food. I myself was deceived by ordering Negresko void of chicken and my wife had burnt grilled half chicken. Be more selective from the menu.
reviews.title: Some items are good others no

reviews.text:
Very good place to have seafood .
Good tasty food with reasonable prices.
Recommended to eat on a budget.
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.text: frischer geht es nicht und sehr günstig. Zu empfehlen ist die Fsichsuppe den Reis nach Art des Hauses und die Fischplatte. Alkoholische Getränke gibt es natürlich nicht aber das Essen ist das Wichtigste hier.
reviews.title: Fisch essen wie man es liebt.

reviews.text:
تجربتى فى  المطعم كانت جميلة جدا مقابل ما تدفعه
انصح بشدة بشوربه السى فود والطواجن ووجبات البكلويز ولكن لم احب المقليات ولا السنجارى

reviews.text: بالرغم من إنه مش من المطاعم المشهورة لكن انا مينفعش أروح بورسعيد من غير مأتغدي فيه خصوصا فرع بورفؤاد الطاجن هناك جبار وشوربة السيفود رائعة والأسعار حلوة جدا مش زي الكاستن وعبده

location.address: Tarh El Bahr St. In Front Of Suzan Mubarak Library, Port Said Egypt

name: Central Perk
rankingString: #5 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text: I was excited to see the place from the outside and on first going in. The furniture looks the same as in the series and the whole setup of the place gives a very familiar vibe. The toilet was, however, not good and the muffin and hot chocolate I ordered were just average
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text:
Great coffee and very cozy atmosphere. 
Clean bathroom and nice service. 
Adequate prices.
Also very good location and easily accessible
reviews.title: Very cozy

reviews.text: Not a big fan of "Freinds", yet, I loved the place and the vibes. Friendly staff, tasty desserts and a clean place.
reviews.title: Nice spot

reviews.text:
We arrived at the place around 3 pm - we were on hurry because we should travel at 6. 
we asked for menu and finally after deciding what we want to order, we were surprised that there's a change in the menu and that don't serve Pizzas anymore. 
and they gave us another menu. 
we checked the menu and again after deciding what to eat; we were told that the chef will arrive by 4:00 pm - we told them that we are on hurry, so if we can have our orders ready by 4:30 we will stay. 
by 3:57 almost 4 we were told that the chef is on his way; we asked again if we will be able to have our orders by 4:30 at this time we were told maybe around 5:00 
we wasted the time waiting and decided to leave 

but to be honest the place is nice and cool. a lil bit overrated yet; good. 
the smell of the waffles were amazing unfortunately we didn't have the chance to try. 

would like to try it another time; maybe this time I would like the place more. 

The picture is from their page on FB
reviews.title: disappointing service

photos.caption: The pictures from the Cafe FB Page

reviews.text:
Very cool idea by bunch of young motivated Egyptians.

Place is buzzing all the time with awesome seating areas 

Must visit if you are in the city.
reviews.title: Cool

reviews.text: the drinks and desserts are good, but the place is very small, packed with too much furniture, I sat to a table for 3, my chair was in the entrance, the other two chairs you couldn't use them because you would then need to move the couch just to move them for an inch
reviews.title: overrated

reviews.text: We visited the place after hearing about it everywhere as it is supposed to mimic the friends setup.. I have to say I has nothing to do with friends central perk, they just added the same pattern on the couches and chairs and that's it! Service is a disaster!!! Needless to say the place and the bathroom are filthy!!!! Never going again.
reviews.title: Disappointing!

reviews.text:
Enjoy a nice cup of coffee in Port Fouad’s coziest spots. Watch one of all times best tv series “FRIENDS” while sitting on a super comfy couch, and treat yourself to a delicious cheese cake. 
The staff is also super decent and friendly.
Loved the place.
reviews.title: A special place for “FRIENDS” freaks

reviews.text: A great place in port said where I ate my a delicious breakfast. You can’t miss the nostalgia with the infamous TV series Friends where everything surrounds you reminds of it. Great staff and great relaxing music.
reviews.title: Great place to set back and relax

reviews.text: - This cafe is identical to the series. You can watch it as long as you stay. Staff are very nice and friendly. Quality of food is medium. However the quality of drinks whether it cold or hot is perfect. Location is very good.
reviews.title: Very good place for F.R.I.E.N.D.S.!

location.address: Port Fouad, Gomhoria st. Tel: 0663411131, Port Said 42534 Egypt

name: Gianola
rankingString: #7 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text:
Nice place & clean, almost enjoy a cup of coffee or Juice at Gianola, Service is good, but a little overpriced.
The problem also is the parking, you can't find a place to park on the street.
reviews.title: Good restaurant & coffee shop

reviews.text: It’s a clean and nice place where you can enjoy enjoy a nice desert and ice cream or coffee with your family or friends. It’s just a bit expensive for the quality.
reviews.title: Nice deserts

reviews.text: Excellent ice cream. Expensive. Good service. Wide space. Sit and chat for whatever time You want. Go by a cab much easier.
reviews.title: Downtown with a parking problem

reviews.text:
One of the best arab/turkish sandwiches are shawerma which is very popular in the middle east. While walking in Tarh el bahr St., last Thursday- March 9,  I was attracted by the smell of shawerma at Gianola Express Shop. Gianola was owned to a famous greek family in Port Said before it was renewed with the same name but different owner.
I was walking with my family, so I thought let is give it a try since we have tried other Gianola dished before such as sheesh tawook and it was great.
We had three Meat Turkish Shawermas which are in a lebanese/turkish bread. It was like eating uncooked skin, not meat at all. It was difficult to eat since you will have to see what is really inside the sandwich! you will remove most of the uncooked skin first trying to find a way to finish it. We have eneded hours later throwing up and had diarrhea as well. 
This was really the worst shawerma we have ever had in our life, so we will never try eating in the same restaurant again.
reviews.title: Worst Shawerma You will Ever Had in Your Life

reviews.text:
its good and quite place to gt your breakfast 
fresh bakery nice place 
i think since 18**  couldn't remember
reviews.title: oldest place in port said

reviews.text: Everyhting is amazing . they offer a very good menu .. you must try every single stuff there ..  the food there is Fresh .. tasty . delicious .. the bakery items . "Konafa " .. "Choclate cake " has a unique special taste ..Its good value for the price too
reviews.title: Tasty delicious

reviews.text: Gianola offers a very good menu I doubt you can find any item that will disappoint you,they are professionals in execution and quality of food is very good,great value for money and service is very good.its a great place to have a nice meal with a fine dessert.I love this place.
reviews.title: Great food,great quality,Very good service

Some how expensive and 1 or 2 clients only with me which gives a sign its not popular cos it has mistakes And all here knows that.

reviews.text: You wait a long time for average tasting food.  The quantity of food is great.  Sandwiches are very large but lack in flavor and taste very bland.  You will have to wait a very long time (20 minutes +) for your food.  That is not fast.  Do not visit on a Thursday or Friday night if you wish to have a place to sit.  Staff just stands around playing on their mobile devices instead of helping customers.
reviews.title: Not bad but not good.

reviews.text: They are making very nice fast food and they have their own plates. The food is very nice but at the end you are sitting in the street but the stuff is clean and helps you.

reviews.text: we have tried the most recommended pizza , the smoked salmon & the seafood. the pizza was very generously topped , the taste was nice but more like open sandwich than pizza

reviews.text: We chose here because there is an English which helped us. It’s an Egyptian take on Italian food. A cosy eating area, non smoking which was nice. Fairly basic pizza and pasta dishes, nice salad mezze and juices, and not overpriced. The staff were very welcoming and friendly.

reviews.text:
The resturant have a good place and clean one have a bad menu it must have alot of choices to eat

reviews.text: It is an old place, but it is able to maintain excellence and sophistication in dealing with customers.  It is a restaurant specializing in pizza, pasta, and drinks in the middle of the city, in a privileged location, and in front of it there is a small car park.  Prices are a little high, but are reasonable. It has a place outside in the open air. You can enjoy the morning sun rays in the pleasant winter weather, as well as in the evening in the days of mild weather.
reviews.title: Restaurant and coffee

reviews.text: Great service. Good pizza n Pasta. Food is tasty. They offer salads n other main courses. The place is cosy and the service is good. Prices are average.
reviews.title: Good Pizza n Pasta

reviews.text:
Over 30 years, every time i visit Port Said I must eat at Pizza Pino, One of the oldest & best restaurants in Port Said, Good food, Good Staff, Pizza is wonderful, not only pizza, also chicken was great.
Until my next visit.
reviews.title: One of the oldest Restaurants i have visited

reviews.text:
For more than 30 years , The quality is the same. The staff hospitality is amazing.
The Pizza is amazing . 
They serve a good breakfast.
reviews.title: One of Port-Said Landmarks

reviews.text: In general quality is maintained but not unique as before. Prices went up every where but at Pizza Pino have gone up and up. Sit there during weekdays but avoid week ends.
reviews.title: Becoming Expensive

location.address: 23rd Of July St. intersection of el gomhoureya st., Port Said Egypt

name: El Borg Restaurants For Sea Food
rankingString: #4 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text: Real tip, the best sea food restaurant in Egypt, staff are professional and food is delicious and you have kids area, if you going with family, you will enjoy it so much
reviews.title: The best sea food restaurant in Egypt

reviews.text: Resturant is not clean, cats everywhere, very bad smells around you even at outdoor tables, the food taste was very bad because the fish was not fresh!
reviews.title: So bad experience!

reviews.text: We visited the restaurant based on the reviews here, we were a big group and we were seated instantly. Our order took a while to be served but the food was really good.. I ordered the shrimp that came with the soup it was cooked in and it was delicious. It was very cheap too compare to Alexandria. Recommend
reviews.title: Satisfying seafood

reviews.text:
This was a true local restaurant where we went to eat seafood. Mr Hosny, the manager, was the only one who spoke English and helped us with the ordering. No one else could understand our requirements. 
We went and chose the prawns: E£300-500 per kg depending upon size. You have to keep a sharp eye on the number given and served as well as that you pay for actual weight on the weighing scale, not what they claim it to be. 
Lots of food just went on coming which we had not ordered- an attempt to bill us once its on the table - a standard local practice - so we sent it back. Food was bland but eatable. Spent too much time cleaning the prawns rather then eating them! 
I would not go there again due to above issues.
reviews.title: A quick unsatisfying meal

reviews.text: Lively restaurant with a family ambiance and fresh fish. The best jumbo shrimps I have had in Egypt (Port Said shrimps seem to be famous). Big dining room indoors and cafe/drinks outdoors, right next to the beach so when you are finished with your meal you just take a few steps and sit at a beach cafe for tea! Bikes rental place right outside the restaurant so kids can play while you wait for the food. Not too fancy but excellent food and clean place.
reviews.title: The best jumbo shrimps!

reviews.text: On a recommendation, we drove out to Port Saed for the day for a seafood lunch.  The service was friendly and the waiter took the time to explain the dishes we didnt understand.  We received 2 complimentary soups.  The fish dishes were good, but the Sole too dry.  The Gilt Head was good as were the prawns.  We really ended up with too much food.  I tried the soups, but neither to my liking.  It was a "day out", but I will not rush out and do this again.
reviews.title: Relative to whats available

reviews.text:
I live in cairo, and i thought of having a perfect seafood meal and after asking few friends i got lots of recommendations for el Borg Resturant in port said, so i drove to there it took me around 2:30 hours.

Well it worth it.., we have ordered 2 kilos of shrimps, 1 kilo squirrel, 1 kilo of ( mussels) lots of salads and finally craps.

All of the food were very tasty, and the staff are very friendly but as most of the egyptian restaurants they are not professional in servicing or dealing with customers.

The price is very reasonable, you should give it a try
reviews.title: Tasty seafood

locations.name: El Borg Restaurants For Sea Food

reviews.text:
I use to be a frequent visitor to this restaurant whenever I come to Egypt. Lately however, unfortunately it’s declining in reference to quality, service, and cleanliness, but most importantly, the new staff who will do anything to conn you on the menu.

For example, I ordered for 8 people, no salads. Within 5min, plats of salads and appetizer started to rain on us. I told the waiter that we didn’t order these, with smile, he said this comes with your order. It’s free. So I replied fine.

We were about to start eating, the waiters kept hovering around us, then gradually approaching me and saying that they’re about the finish their shifts, so if you need anything, now is the time. Bottom line they wanted a tip before leaving.

We have barely started to eat. It was very sad. Then the surprise was when we received the bill. Things we didn’t order, charged for the salads, and much much more.

Regretfully, AlBorg is NO longer what it used to be.
reviews.title: Very disappointed

reviews.text:
The place is very famous not only at port said but allover EGYPT
The place serve high quality seafood with different cooking styles from many countries allover the world .
reviews.title: The oldest and most famous

reviews.text: Simple restaurant, very good food and a supreme location. The view of the Suez Canal entering the Med, as well as the Zohr gas field are spectacular.
reviews.title: Working dinner

Ice cream is one of its kind. Must try.

Most of items are available only after 3pm. Ice cream only after 5pm

reviews.text: It is a shop that sells eastern and western sweets. It is very well known in the city of Port Said and it is of high quality and located in the city center.
reviews.title: A fantastic confectioner

reviews.text: Great selection of Arabic sweets, Cakes and Ice Cakes. Prices are higher than other shops but the quality is perfect. They also have a good selection of snacks. Sadly they don't have a sitting area.

reviews.text: This is the second time I've popped into Lord patisserie for a selection of their baklava.  The staff are super friendly and helpful.  The selection of Baklava, cakes and pastries is impressive and really excellent.  Probably the best I've tasted and I've been fortunate enough to eat Greek & Turkish Baklava.  YUM

reviews.text:

reviews.text: Lord patisserie has the best desserts in whole city. Eastern and western desserts are available. Staff are nice and helpful. Special orders are also available. Desserts are really tasty and delicious. Prices are suitable.

name: Kastan
rankingString: #10 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text:
I'm from Alex so I know seafood. This experience was very satisfying, their seafood is the best I've ever tried and it's highly recommended. 
Very friendly staff
reviews.title: Best seafood experince

reviews.text:
The food is very good but little bit expensive
Staff are friendly and nice
Very nice view infront of the Mediterranean sea
reviews.title: Good food

reviews.text:
I have visited this restaurant twice. The first time came there by my husband's boss recommendation. Amazing choice of sea food. 
The second time I would like to repeat my experience and failed. The waiter serving me was courteous at the beginning but inserted a salad I did not order and over calculated me. I paid by MasterCard and then compared the bill - I demanded to charge me back. Restaurant Manger listened to me and did nothing. Spoiled impression and prices inflated in comparison with the first my visit.
Probably will recommend but you should be on alert. Sea view is stunning. Alcohol is not serving. WC is primitive and next door restaurant.
reviews.title: Well known sea food restaurant chain

reviews.text: Excelente restaurante donde apreciar la comida tipica de Port Said. En el podrás elegir el pescado o marisco que te quieres comer.
reviews.title: Especialidades de Port Said

reviews.text:
Moins connu que son voisin immédiat El-Borg, Kastan est parfois préféré par les port-saïdiens qui y rencontrent peut-être moins de touristes. Guinguette traditionnelle également sans prétention, au style marin affirmé, plus intime. La cuisine de poisson y est tout aussi remarquable ; le service, moins débordé est plus avenant.

Il ne faut pas hésiter à varier le choix de ses soirées dans des lieux qui font connaître une Egypte méconnue aux accents méditerranéens.
reviews.title: Un des grands restaurants de poisson de Port-Saïd

location.address: Port Said Egypt

name: Porto Fish

reviews.text: I am Egyptian but this is my first visit to Port Said, I loved the city and really enjoyed our lunch in Porto fish restaurant, excellent service , smiling all the time and more than excellent food.
reviews.title: Excellent restaurant for seafood

reviews.text:
i went to this place 3 times 
once with  my working team 
and 2 times with family 
place is so clean 
food is almost the best quality and variable
reviews.title: dinner with working team

location.address: 23rd of July Street, Extension of Al Manakh District Al Jameel Club Wall, Port Said 42311 Egypt

name: Portobello Lounge
rankingString: #14 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text: Truly excellent food. We ordered chicken quesadilla and fajita.. it was delicious. The place is on the main street of Port Said and offers a large variety of Italian and Mexican food. It quite clean and modern, the service is a bit slow and I think they should improve it. Tge staff is quite friendly and courteous. I would recommend eating there if you visit this city
reviews.title: Very good restaurant

reviews.text:
I enjoyed with my kids, It was good experience, The food was good and the hostess she was very attention to details. 

Thanks.
reviews.title: Nice food and service

reviews.text: Se volete un posto mediamente più pulito, va bene. Se volete un posto dove si mangia pesce fresco va bene. Se volete un posto dove non riassettano il locale quando mangiate, come fanno tutti i ristoranti qui, non va bene.
reviews.title: Pesce fresco, ma...

reviews.text: Bun locale di tendenza di Porto said ma niente di che.Buona la Caesar Salad ed il gelato alla frutta fresca.Buono il sevizio.Fumano tutti dentro e cio mi crea molto fastidio.
reviews.title: Tendenza

location.address: Elshaheed Atef Elsadat, Port Said Egypt

name: Ibn Hamido
rankingString: #12 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text:
The staff are very friendly.  But the service is very weak.

You can eat their whatever you want with a cheap price.  New type of seafood cuisines you may experience  there.

It is a good choice if you think in seafood.
reviews.title: Amazing Experience

reviews.text: Зашли по совету местного жителя. Интерьер своеобразный - яркий, клеенки на столах, пластиковая посуда. Но это всё не важно. На выбор разного калибра креветки, рыба, морепродукты, всё свежее. Вы выбираете сами, говорите сколько и каким образом приготовить. С английским у обслуживающего персонала не очень, но они стараются изо всех сил помочь. Очень понравился какой-то вид местной крупной рыбы. Ее при подаче разделали, она получилась без костей, вкусная, сочная, вкуснее дорадо там же. Креветки тоже очень вкусные, приготовили с овощами и местными специями. 1 кг креветок, 2 рыбины, суп, лепешки, свежие овощи и лимонад на четверых обошелся около 60USD. И комплимент от заведения в виде десерта! У нас была вкусная Панна Котта!
reviews.title: Выглядит как столовая, кормят как в ресторане!

location.address: Saad Zaghloul, Port Said Egypt

name: Al Burj Sea Food Restaurant
rankingString: #19 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text:
The resultant Is not clean and staff is not professional at all.
The fish is not fresh . Seafood taste is frozen since long

Once this restaurant was the best in Egypt
reviews.title: Low quality seafood

reviews.text: Good food but not all the time, good staff helpful & friendly but law standard furniture and equipment are not suitable for what you pay there. Sometimes restaurant is smelly
reviews.title: Average standard

reviews.text:
good tradtional nice food 
like it so much 
try chrimps with creamy layer grilled dish 
mmmmm also octopus grilled/fried is great as hell
reviews.title: good

reviews.text:
An OK experience... Good service; rich menu and very tasty food. 
Make sure you try their oven baked caviar... different from anything I've tried and very delicious. 

I wish I could say the same about the cleanliness though, which was not up to standard.. Oh well.
reviews.title: Typical fish restaurant at PortSaid

reviews.text: very poor restaurant and not value for the money at all, food is a little bad i didn't enjoyed at all
reviews.title: poor restaurant

reviews.text:
Does not start service till 1 PM. 

Fish soup is very good with an excellent broth. 

Fried rice is flavored with lovely sautéed onions and shrimp. 

The sautéed  fish (bream I believe) was perfectly cooked. 

The shrimp peeled very easily meaning not over cooked at all. 

Homemade hot sauce was to die for. 

Reasonable lay good service.
reviews.title: Great lunch stop

reviews.text: Just if you are looking for wonderful taste, then i advise you for that restaurant, but you shall forget and do not think a bit about services and clean tables and smell inside the restaurant
reviews.title: taste is wonderful

reviews.text: الي محمد سليمان صاحب المطعم. بكلمك باحترام وذوق علي حقي اللي عندك ومش عايز تدفعه بتقولي معرفش حد بالاسم ده. احب افكرك بيا انا جمال عبد الكريم اللي بعتلك الفيلا بتاعتك في مدينتي. ملحوظه الاكونتات كتيره جدا عندي. هتعملي حظر هنا زي الواتساب هتلاقي تعليقات كتيره هنا من اكونتات مختلفه فياريت حقي بالادب لاني زهقت مطالبه افكرك بالرقم اللي انت عمله حظر 01140806074. وعلي فكره هتلاقيني بعلق بنفس الاسلوب ده في جميع الفروع لحد ما تديني حقي وابقي اقفل في وشي السكه تاني. لو في حد محترم جه يقولي ليه كدا هقوله انا بقالي من شهر 3/2020 بطالب بحقي بالادب وهو يعملي حظر علي كل رقم أكلمه منه زهقت زهقت انا بطالب بحقي ومش بطلب حسنه..
reviews.title: القاهرة الجديدة

reviews.text: ألاكل سيئ جدا  لاانصح به على الإطلاق والمكان ومستوى النظافة رديئ للغايه لايستحق ولا حتى نجمه واحده شكرا
reviews.title: مطعم البرج محافظه بور سعيد

reviews.text: من احلى المطاعم في الموقع والمنظر المطل على البحر  والاكل البحريات من سمك جمبري كابوريا سيبيا استاكوزا حنشان بكلويز بطارخ مع اختلاف طرق الطهي وتنوعها والسلطات والشوربه بجميع انواعها يستحق الزياره والتذوق
reviews.title: طرح البحر بورسعيد

reviews.text: Best variety of Sweets available which are fresh and aromatic, best selection of chocolates,cakes and sweets during festive occassion too.  totally recommended.Customized cakes too available.
reviews.title: Variety of eggless sweets

reviews.text: the cakes all taste the same. Millefeuille is okay. Ice cream is the best ( mistika, pistachio are the best flavors).
reviews.title: Ice cream great, cakes okay

reviews.text: يقدم هذا المطعم اجمل السندويتشات السريعة واللذيذة فأنا أحب هذا المطعم لأن العاملين به علي خلق ومهذبين وعلي قدر كافي من الخبرة والتعامل مع الزبائن

location.address: 79 El Gomhoureya St. In Front Of El Salam Mosque, Port Said Egypt

name: Pizza Hut
rankingString: #15 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text: When you order pizza at Pizza Hut , you expect the best in town. It is not the case. Prices increased and quality did not improve. I think they are using inferior ingredients and minimizing their amount in preparing the recipe. One good thing is the tidiness of the place.
reviews.title: Below Average Quality

reviews.text:
Not always good
Some times you will eat an awesome pizzas, but other time you will eat a very bad one
Not always good
It is unstable quality
reviews.title: Normal

reviews.text: Pizza hut in Port Said is a nice place to eat and very comfortable, the staff are friendly and helpful. We have enjoyed our stay and meal.
reviews.title: nice as always

reviews.text: I have eaten here several times.  If you eat in the restaurant you will have a great experience with good food and friendly service. On a Thursday or Friday night you will have a long wait to eat because there are a lot of people ordering and limited seating.  I advise against ordering delivery.  We waited almost 2 hours for our pizza to arrive after they told us 45 minutes.  When it arrived it was very cold and poor quality, under-cooked and lacking in toppings.  You have to pay extra for delivery and the driver expects a tip but the food is extremely late.
reviews.title: Do not order delivery

reviews.text: I liked food and the service too, but if you would get your order take away with you it would take some time. Other than that i good.
reviews.title: Amazing food

reviews.text:
세계애서서 가장 맛있다는 이집트의 피자헛 2012년 에 이어 두번째로 맛을 보았다.
맛은 보통 하지만 피라미드가 바로 앞에 보이는 그 풍경은 맛을 한층 더해준다
reviews.title: 이집트 피자헛

reviews.text: انا من عشاق البيتزا وكل مكان اذهب اليه لازم اقوم بزيارة الي اي مطعم بيتزا لانها من الآكلات اللذيذة التي أحبها وهذا المطعم يمتاز بتقديم البيتزا ساخنة وبطريقة طهي رائعة والخدمة به جيدة
reviews.title: بيتزا هت بورسعيد

reviews.text: коль это пиццерия, то и пицца- главное в меню этого ресторана, смущает правда одно, что пицца Хат и KFC находятся в одном здании и соседи двери в двери. В лучших традициях этого ресторана в меню более десятка всевозможных пицц, на любой выбор, жаль только со свининой нет ;), салатный бар поразил количеством салатов и оплачивая за тарелку, пока принесут пиццу, можно пару раз посетить салатный рай. Скажу одно, что я в течении двух месяцев посещал это заведение ибо вкусно и не дорого. Мне очень понравилось и в следующий раз, если по работе меня занесёт в Порт Саид, я обязательно приду в Pizza Hut Restaurant.
reviews.title: Классическая пиццерия

reviews.text: Bad decorations, the staff are trying to be friendly , bad beverage, bad place, full of Mosquitos , but you can smoke Shisha there and play cards.
reviews.title: Bad

reviews.text: Entramos a tomar una cerveza y nos dejamos el teléfono móvil en la mesa, nos percatamos de ello dos horas después, nos acercamos a ver si había suerte y allí estaba. Fredy el señor que nos atendió lo había guardado, ejemplo de honradez es usted señor Fredy. Muchas gracias.
reviews.title: Honradez empleados

location.address: Abdel Rahman Shokry St. Beside Transmission Station, Port Said Egypt

name: El Ayouty
rankingString: #21 of 45 places to eat in Port Said

reviews.text: I visited the restaurant in July for breakfast and the tables were not clean, poor and slow service and the staff are not well trained. When I asked the waiter for eating utensils he looked at me as if I’m talking non sense. There was also a hair on my plate. This used to be a nice restaurant but after my experience this summer I will never go there.
reviews.title: Worst breakfast ever

reviews.text: If you want popular foul and falafel, this the right place. Outdoors sitting, ok. but not fancy. Do not overstuff your table. Order what you can eat.
reviews.title: Inexpensive and casual

reviews.text:
It's your average Egyptian Foule (beans) place, they make falafel, potatoes, and all the other stuff Foule restaurants usually make.
It is good quality food, clean, and well priced with decent variety - makes for a good breakfast.
reviews.title: Decent Breakfast

reviews.text:
you can taste & enjoy that delicious Taste of Egyptian Food from Fool & Falafel especially in Ramadan.
Try to sit into its Restaurant in Corniche
reviews.title: Fool Master

reviews.text:
احب هذا المطعم كثيرا فهو المكان الانسب لتناول الافطار المصرى الشهى او لتناول السندوتشات فى المساء 
انصح به جدا لزيارته اكثر من مرة
reviews.title: دائم التعامل مع هذا المطعم

owner_response.text: We Appreciated So Much Mr Mostafa ... Thank You💐💐

reviews.text: KFC in Cairo is amazing - different and better than United States.  It was amazingly delicious.  Had to cross a busy road but well worth it.

reviews.text: классические куриные ножки KFC. Заказывали на постоянной основе с собой. Нет ничего прекраснее усесться на набережной у Средиземного моря и под дуновение бриза, умять куринную ножку с кетчупом под салатик;)
reviews.title: классика
